H0.text: The Ironman World Championship, which has been held annually in Hawaii since 1978, with an additional race in 1982, involves which sport. Cycling

H1.text: The Ironman World Championship, which has been held annually in Hawaii since 1978, with an additional race in 1982, involves which sport. Swimming

H2.text: The Ironman World Championship, which has been held annually in Hawaii since 1978, with an additional race in 1982, involves which sport. Running

H3.text: The Ironman World Championship, which has been held annually in Hawaii since 1978, with an additional race in 1982, involves which sport. Triathlon

A4.text: The Ironman World Championship is a triathlon held annually in Hawaii
